## [City Clerk](https://www.cityofportsmouth.com/cityclerk)

Office

1 Junkins Avenue, Portsmouth, NH 03801

Hours

Monday 8 AM – 6 PM

Tuesday 8 AM – 4:30 PM

Wednesday 9 AM – 4:30 PM

Thursday 8 AM – 4:30 PM

Friday 8 AM – 1 PM

Phone

(603) 610-7245

Fax

(603) 610-4158
